title: If presenter on YouTube is wearing Taweez, is it ok to watch if it's halal content? Assim al hakeem
transcript: um if we were to watch some uh videos on youtube and we um noticed that the presenter of this clip wears at a visa an amulet or wearing a cross and these are all shirk signs but he's talking about technology so is there anything wrong in listening to what he has to say the answer is no this is permissible and there's no problem in that and allah azzawajal knows best
